class.name: BezierCurve
class.desc: A Bezier curve. This class can be used to draw smooth curves or move things smoothly on curves. It's also used internally for skeletal animation. The curves are 3-dimensional, but convenience methods are added for 2d curves and there is a caching mechanism for 2d height data to speed up bezier curve usage in animation.A bezier curve consists of control points, each having 3 points: one middle point and two 'handles'. The middle point is the actual position of the control point and the two side points serve as vectors defining how the curve curves towards the next control points.

member.name: insertPoint
member.desc: The point after which new control points should be added. If NULL, new control points are added to the end of the curve.

member.name: evaluationAccuracy
member.desc: Accuracy value for X-axis curve evaluation. The higher this number, the faster but less accurate X-axis curve evaluation is. Defaults to 0.01

class.name: Camera
class.desc: Camera in a 3D scene. Cameras can be added to a scene and changed between dynamically. You can also set a shader to a camera that will run as a screen shader for post-processing effects.
class.class_notes: NOTE: Camera instances are not automatically garbage collected.

static_member.name: ORTHO_SIZE_MANUAL
static_member.desc: ProjectionMode: Orthographic projection, with manually set size.

static_member.name: ORTHO_SIZE_LOCK_HEIGHT
static_member.desc: ProjectionMode: Orthographic projection, with height specified used and width scaled proportionally .

static_member.name: ORTHO_SIZE_LOCK_WIDTH
static_member.desc: ProjectionMode: Orthographic projection, with width specified used and height scaled proportionally.

static_member.name: ORTHO_SIZE_VIEWPORT
static_member.desc: ProjectionMode: Orthographic projection, scaled to viewport backing resolution.

static_member.name: PERSPECTIVE_FOV
static_member.desc: ProjectionMode: Perspective projection, with field of view specified.

static_member.name: PERSPECTIVE_FRUSTUM
static_member.desc: ProjectionMode: Perspective projection, with bounds set by edges of frustum.

static_member.name: MANUAL_MATRIX
static_member.desc: ProjectionMode: Manual matrix projection. Use setProjectionMatrix to set the matrix.

member.name: frustumCulling
member.desc: Toggles the frustum culling of the camera. (Defaults to true).

member.name: topLeftOrtho
member.desc: If set to true, the orthographic projection will be set with the 0,0 coordinate in the top left corner of the viewport. Otherwise, the 0,0 coordinate is in the center.

member.name: cameraShift
member.desc: Shifts camera frustum by factor of the frustum size. (x=-1 will shift the frustum to the left by a whole screen width).

class.name: Config
class.desc: Saves and loads simple config files. Config stores, loads and saves string and number values associated by string keys. You can use to easily save and load settings and preferences and other data. Configs are separated by namespaces, so you can have multiple configs with the same keys.

class.name: CoreServices
class.desc: Global services singleton. CoreServices instantiates and provides global Singleton access to all of the main manager classes in Polycode as well as the Renderer and Config classes.

method.name: getInstance
method.desc: Returns the singleton instance. NOTE: The singleton instance is unique to each thread and currently Polycode does not support multithreaded access to the core services. The reason for this is being able to run multiple cores in the same application and still have global singleton access to these services.

class.name: Entity
class.desc: Base class for both 2D and 3D objects in Polycode. It provides position and color transformations as well as hierarchy for all Polycode objects.
class.class_notes: NOTE: Entity instances are not automatically garbage collected.

member.name: ownsChildren
member.desc: If set to true, will automatically delete children upon destruction. (defaults to false).

member.name: billboardMode
member.desc: @name Rendering properties Methods and properties affecting the way the entity is rendered. If this flag is true, the entity will always face the camera. False by default.

member.name: color
member.desc: The entity's color.

member.name: enabled
member.desc: If this flag is set to false, this entity will not be rendered or updated.

member.name: visible
member.desc: If this flag is set to false, this entity will not be rendered.

member.name: depthWrite
member.desc: If this flag is set to false, this entity will not write to the depth buffer when it's rendered.

member.name: depthTest
member.desc: If this flag is set to false, this entity will not check the depth buffer when it's rendering.

member.name: colorAffectsChildren
member.desc: If set to false, the children of this entity will not multiply by this entity's color. Set to true by default.

member.name: visibilityAffectsChildren
member.desc: If set to false, the children will be rendered even if the entity is invisible.

member.name: ignoreParentMatrix
member.desc: If set to true, the entity's transformations will not be affected by its parents. Defaults to false.

member.name: enableScissor
member.desc: If set to true, will constrain the rendering of this entity into the viewport coordinates defined by scissorBox. @see scissorBox

member.name: scissorBox
member.desc: Defines the viewport coordinates to clip rendering to if enableScissor is defined. @see enableScissor

member.name: editorOnly
member.desc: Flags an editor only entity. If set to true, this entity will not be saved to file by entity instances or show up in the IDE entity editor.

member.name: id
member.desc: String ID of the entity. Can be used to retrieve specific entities by their ID.

member.name: collisionShapeType
member.desc: Entity collision type for physics module. This is set per physics module documentaiton.

member.name: processInputEvents
member.desc: If set to true, will automatically process mouse events and dispatch its own input events if mouse events intersect with the entity's bounding box. Defaults to false. Attention: All of the entity's parents' processInputEvents flags must be set to true for this to function including the parent Scene's rootEntity!

member.name: blockMouseInput
member.desc: If set to true, will block input events for entities below itself in the parent's entiy list.

member.name: snapToPixels
member.desc: If set to true, will round the position of this entity to integral values. Use this if you need pixel-perfect positioning in 2D.

member.name: layerID
member.desc: Layer ID. Used by entity instances to separate entities into groups.

method.name: Render
method.desc: Main render method. Override this to do your own drawing.

method.name: Update
method.desc: Main update method. Override this to do your updates before the render cycle.

method.name: Clone
method.desc: Clones the entity, return an exact copy. This method must be implemented in an Entity subclass for you to be able to clone it.

param.name: deepClone
param.desc: If true, perform a deep clone, cloning all the children.

param.name: ignoreEditorOnly
param.desc: If true, ignore all child entities where editorOnly is set to true (will still clone the entity you call Clone() on even if its editorOnly flag is set to true.

method.name: applyClone
method.desc: This method must be implemented by all subclasses implementing Clone.

method.name: dirtyMatrix
method.desc: @name Matrix operations. These methods operate directly on the entity's matrix. Sets the state of the dirty matrix flag. The dirty matrix flag gets set automatically when a transformation is applied to the entity and the transfrom matrix needs to be rebuilt. This method is provided to manually override that flag.

param.name: val
param.desc: New value of the dirty matrix flag.

method.name: rebuildTransformMatrix
method.desc: Forces the transformation matrix to be rebuilt.

method.name: updateEntityMatrix
method.desc: Forces the matrix to be rebuilt if the matrix flag is dirty. This is also called on all of the entity's children.

method.name: getTransformMatrix
method.desc: Returns the entity's transform matrix.

method.name: getConcatenatedMatrix
method.desc: Returns the entity's matrix multiplied by its parent's concatenated matrix. This, in effect, returns the entity's actual world transformation.

method.name: getConcatenatedMatrixRelativeTo
method.desc: Returns the concatenated matrix up to the specified parent entity.

param.name: relativeEntity
param.desc: Parent entity, relative to which to return the transform matrix.

method.name: getAnchorAdjustedMatrix
method.desc: Returns the concatenated matrix, multiplied by the entity's anchor adjustment. @see setAnchorPoint

method.name: getConcatenatedRollMatrix
method.desc: Returns Same as getConcatenatedMatrix(), but contains only roll information for rotation. Used internally for billboards.

method.name: setTransformByMatrixPure
method.desc: Sets the transform matrix directly, without setting all of the individual transfrom properties of the entity.

method.name: getLookAtMatrix
method.desc: Returns the matrix for the entity looking at a location based on a location and an up vector.

method.name: addChild
method.desc: @name Hierarchy operations. These methods add and remove entities to and from each other. Adds another entity as a child. The children inherit the parent's transforms.

method.name: removeChild
method.desc: Removes an entity from the entity's children.

method.name: moveChildUp
method.desc: Moves the specified child one position up the render list.

method.name: moveChildDown
method.desc: Moves the specified child one position down the render list.

method.name: moveChildTop
method.desc: Moves the specified child up to the top of the render list.

method.name: moveChildBottom
method.desc: Moves the specified child up to the bottom of the render list.

method.name: setParentEntity
method.desc: Manually sets the entity's parent. This method does not add the entity to the parent and should not be called manually.

method.name: getParentEntity
method.desc: Returns the parent entity of the entity.

method.name: getNumChildren
method.desc: Returns the number of child entities belonging to this entity.

method.name: getChildAtIndex
method.desc: Returns the child entity at specified index.

method.name: setOwnsChildrenRecursive
method.desc: Sets the ownsChildren flag for this entity and recursively for all its child entities. @see ownsChildren

method.name: getPosition
method.desc: @name Transform operations. These methods apply various transformations to the entity. Returns the entity's position.

method.name: getPosition2D
method.desc: Returns the entity's position as a Vector2

method.name: getCombinedPosition
method.desc: Returns the entity's position added to the combined position of its parent. This method is here only for convenience of calculating certain properties and should not be used to get an entity's actual position in the world. To get the actual world position of the entity, use the entity's concatendated matrix.@see getConcatenatedMatrix()

method.name: setPosition
method.desc: Sets the entity's position.

method.name: setPositionX
method.desc: Returns the entity's position on the X axis.

method.name: setPositionY
method.desc: Returns the entity's position on the Y axis.

method.name: Translate
method.desc: Translates the entity relative to its current position.

method.name: setPositionZ
method.desc: Returns the entity's position on the Z axis.

method.name: setScaleX
method.desc: Returns the entity's scale on the X axis.

method.name: setScaleY
method.desc: Returns the entity's scale on the Y axis.

method.name: setScaleZ
method.desc: Returns the entity's scale on the Z axis.

method.name: Scale
method.desc: Scales the entity relative to its current scale.

method.name: setScale
method.desc: Sets the entity's scale.

method.name: getCompoundScale
method.desc: Returns the entity's scale multiplied by its parent's compound scale.

method.name: getScale
method.desc: Returns the entity's scale.

method.name: getRotationEuler
method.desc: Returns the entity's rotation as euler angles

method.name: getCombinedPitch
method.desc: Returns the entity's pitch combined with the combined pitch of its parent.

method.name: getCombinedYaw
method.desc: Returns the entity's yaw combined with the combined yaw of its parent.

method.name: getCombinedRoll
method.desc: Returns the entity's roll combined with the combined roll of its parent.

method.name: rebuildRotation
method.desc: Forces the rotation quaternion to be rebuilt.

method.name: setRotationEuler
method.desc: Sets rotation from euler angles

method.name: setPitch
method.desc: Sets the pitch rotation of the entity.

method.name: setYaw
method.desc: Sets the yaw rotation of the entity.

method.name: setRoll
method.desc: Sets the roll rotation of the entity.

method.name: Roll
method.desc: Rolls the entity relative to its current roll.

method.name: Yaw
method.desc: Yaws the entity relative to its current yaw.

method.name: Pitch
method.desc: Pitches the entity relative to its current pitch.

method.name: getPitch
method.desc: Returns the current pitch of the entity.

method.name: getYaw
method.desc: Returns the current yaw of the entity.

method.name: getRoll
method.desc: Returns the current roll of the entity.

method.name: getWidth
method.desc: Returns the bounding box X value.

method.name: getHeight
method.desc: Returns the bounding box Y value.

method.name: getDepth
method.desc: Returns the bounding box Z value.

method.name: setWidth
method.desc: Sets the bounding box X value.

method.name: setHeight
method.desc: Sets the bounding box Y value.

method.name: setDepth
method.desc: Sets the bounding box Z value.

method.name: setRotationQuat
method.desc: Sets the rotation with quaternion value.

method.name: getRotationQuat
method.desc: Returns the current rotation as a quaternion.

method.name: lookAt
method.desc: Orients the entity towards the specified location with the provided up vector. The up vector determines which side of the entity will be pointing in that direction.

method.name: lookAtEntity
method.desc: Orients the entity towards another entity with the provided up vector. The up vector determines which side of the entity will be pointing in that direction.

method.name: getCombinedColor
method.desc: Returns the entity's color multiplied by its parent entity's combined color.

method.name: setColor
method.desc: Sets the color of the entity as normalized floating point values.

param.name: r
param.desc: Red value as a 0-1 floating point number.

param.name: g
param.desc: Green value as a 0-1 floating point number.

param.name: b
param.desc: Blue value as a 0-1 floating point number.

param.name: a
param.desc: Alpha value as a 0-1 floating point number.

method.name: setColorInt
method.desc: Sets the color of the entity as 0-255 integers.

method.name: setAnchorPoint
method.desc: Sets the anchor (center) point of the entity as normalized half bounding box coordinates. (i.e. -1.0 or 1.0 will offset the entity by half on a particular axis).

method.name: getAnchorPoint
method.desc: Returns the current anchor (center) point of the entity.

method.name: setDepthOnly
method.desc: If this flag is set to true, this entity will render only into the depth buffer. This, effectively, means that it will be invisible, but still obscuring other entities.

method.name: setUserData
method.desc: If this flag is set to true, this entity's transformations will not take into account its parent, making its transforms always relative to 0. Sets user data pointer.

method.name: getUserData
method.desc: Returns the user data pointer.

method.name: setBlendingMode
method.desc: Sets the entity's blending mode.

param.name: newBlendingMode
param.desc: New blending mode to set. Possible values are Renderer.BLEND_MODE_NORMAL, Renderer.BLEND_MODE_LIGHTEN, Renderer.BLEND_MODE_COLOR, Renderer.BLEND_MODE_PREMULTIPLIED, Renderer.BLEND_MODE_MULTIPLY. See the Renderer class for details on individual blending modes. @see Renderer

method.name: getEntityById
method.desc: Returns the first child entity that has the specified string id.

param.name: recursive
param.desc: If set to true, will search all child entities recursively.

method.name: getEntitiesByTag
method.desc: Returns all child entities which have the specified tag.

param.name: recursive
param.desc: If set to true, will search all child entities recursively.

method.name: getEntitiesByLayerID
method.desc: Returns all child entities that have the specified layer ID. Layer IDs are used by the entity instances to separate entities into groups.

param.name: recursive
param.desc: If set to true, will search all child entities recursively.

method.name: getEntityProp
method.desc: Returns custom string dictionary property of the entity based on the property name.

method.name: setEntityProp
method.desc: Sets the entity property for a specified property name in the entity's custom property dictionary.

param.name: propValue
param.desc: Value to set for the specified property name.

method.name: setInverseY
method.desc: If set to true, the y position of the entity matrix will be multiplied by -1.0, inverting its Y-axis coordinate system.

method.name: getInverseY
method.desc: Returns true if the entity is set to use an inverse Y-coordinate system.

method.name: customHitDetection
method.desc: Implement this method to do custom ray hit detection beyond a bounding box check. Always returns true by default.

method.name: getNumTags
method.desc: Returns the number of tags this entity has.

method.name: getTagAtIndex
method.desc: Returns the tag at specified index or an empty string if index is invalid.

method.name: hasTag
method.desc: Returns true if this entity contains the specified tag.

method.name: clearTags
method.desc: Removes all tags from this entity.

method.name: addTag
method.desc: Adds a string tag to the entity.

method.name: getScreenPosition
method.desc: Returns the screen pixel position of the entity

method.name: getWorldAABB
method.desc: Return axis-aligned bounding box in world space.

method.name: getLocalBoundingBox
method.desc: Returns the bounding box of the entity. This is used for hit-testing as well as visibility calculation.

method.name: setLocalBoundingBox
method.desc: Sets the bounding box of the entity as a 3D Vector. This is used for hit-testing as well as visibility calculation.

method.name: setLocalBoundingBoxX
method.desc: Sets the bounding box X-axis value of the entity.

method.name: setLocalBoundingBoxY
method.desc: Sets the bounding box Y-axis value of the entity.

method.name: setLocalBoundingBoxZ
method.desc: Sets the bounding box Z-axis value of the entity.

class.name: Event
class.desc: Event base class. Subclass this class to pass complex data through events.

method.name: Event
method.desc: Default constructor.

method.name: getEventCode
method.desc: Returns the event code for this event.

method.name: getDispatcher
method.desc: Returns the event dispatcher which originated the event.

class.name: EventDispatcher
class.desc: Can dispatch events. The event dispatcher is base class which allows its subclass to dispatch custom events which EventHandler subclasses can then listen to. EventDispatcher and EventHandler are the two main classes in the Polycode event system. If you are familiar with ActionScript3's event system, you will find this to be very similar, except that it uses integers for event codes for speed, rather than strings.

method.name: EventDispatcher
method.desc: Default constructor

method.name: removeAllHandlers
method.desc: Removes all current event handlers from this dispatcher.

method.name: removeAllHandlersForListener
method.desc: Removes all current event handlers from this dispatcher for a specific event listener.

method.name: addEventListener
method.desc: Adds an event listener for a specific event code. Once a listener is registered for a specific event code, that listener will start getting event callbacks into the handleEvent() method.

param.name: handler
param.desc: The event handler to add as a listener

param.name: eventCode
param.desc: The requested event code to listen to. @see EventHandler

method.name: addEventListenerUnique
method.desc: Adds an event listener for specified event code if it hasn't already been added, otherwise does nothing.

param.name: handler
param.desc: The event handler to add as a listener

param.name: eventCode
param.desc: The requested event code to listen to.

method.name: hasEventListener
method.desc: Returns true if this event dispatcher is registered with the specified EventHandler with the specified event code.

method.name: removeEventListener
method.desc: Removes a listener for a specific handler and event code.

param.name: handler
param.desc: The event handler to remove as a listener

param.name: eventCode
param.desc: The requested event code to remove listener for. @see EventHandler

method.name: dispatchEvent
method.desc: Dispatches an event to all handlers listening for the event code specified.

param.name: event
param.desc: Event class to dispatch to listeners. You can subclass the Event class to send data in your events.

param.name: eventCode
param.desc: The event code to dispatch the event for. @see Event @see EventHandler

class.name: EventHandler
class.desc: Can handle events from EventDispatcher classes.

method.name: EventHandler
method.desc: Default constructor

class.name: Image
class.desc: An image in memory. Basic RGB or RGBA images stored in memory. Can be loaded from PNG files, created into textures and written to file.
class.class_notes: NOTE: Image instances are not automatically garbage collected.

method.name: Image
method.desc: Create image from file name.

param.name: fileName
param.desc: Path to image file to load.

method.name: BlankImage
method.desc: Create a blank image of specified size and type.

param.name: width
param.desc: Width of the image to create.

param.name: height
param.desc: Height of the image to create.

param.name: type
param.desc: Type of image to create. Can be IMAGE_RGBA or IMAGE_RGB.

method.name: loadImage
method.desc: Load an image from a file

param.name: fileName
param.desc: Path to image file to load.

method.name: saveImage
method.desc: Saves the image to a file. Currently only PNG files are supported.

param.name: fileName
param.desc: Path to image file to load.

method.name: pasteImage
method.desc: Pastes another image into the image

param.name: x
param.desc: X position of new image within the image

param.name: y
param.desc: Y position of new image within the image

param.name: blendingMode
param.desc: Blending mode to use. Currently not used.

method.name: createEmpty
method.desc: Recreate the image as an empty image of specified size. The image type stays the same.

param.name: width
param.desc: Width of the image to create.

param.name: height
param.desc: Height of the image to create.

method.name: fill
method.desc: Fills the image with the specified color values.

param.name: color
param.desc: The color to fill it with.

method.name: setPixel
method.desc: Sets a pixel at specified coordinates to specified color.

method.name: getPixel
method.desc: Returns the pixel color at specified position.

method.name: drawLine
method.desc: Draws a line with specified color.

method.name: moveBrushTo
method.desc: Moves brush to specified position

method.name: moveBrush
method.desc: Translates brush a specified amount relative to its current position.

param.name: x
param.desc: Amount to translate on X axis

param.name: y
param.desc: Amount to translate on Y axis

method.name: drawLineTo
method.desc: Draws a line to specified position.

method.name: fillRect
method.desc: Draws a rectangle with specified color.

method.name: perlinNoise
method.desc: Draws perlin noise in the image

param.name: alpha
param.desc: If true, affects alpha, if false only affects the color.

method.name: fastBlur
method.desc: Blurs the image

param.name: blurSize
param.desc: Size of the blur in pixels.

method.name: getPixelsInRect
method.desc: Returns an area of the image buffer. The area can go outside of image bounds, in which case the pixels not within the image are zeroed out. This method allocates new memory for the returned buffer and you must free it manually.

param.name: x
param.desc: X position of the area to return.

param.name: y
param.desc: Y position of the area to return.

param.name: width
param.desc: Width of the area to return.

param.name: height
param.desc: Height of the area to return.

method.name: getImagePart
method.desc: Returns a copy of the specified subRect part of the image.

param.name: subRect
param.desc: The part of the image to copy. (0, 0) refers to the top left of the image.

method.name: getBrushX
method.desc: Returns the x position of the brush.

method.name: getBrushY
method.desc: Returns the y position of the brush.

method.name: getWidth
method.desc: Returns the width of the image.

method.name: getHeight
method.desc: Returns the height of the image.

method.name: getPixels
method.desc: Returns the raw image data

method.name: premultiplyAlpha
method.desc: Multiplies the RGB values by alpha for each pixel.

class.name: InputEvent
class.desc: Event dispatched by CoreInput. This event is dispatched by CoreInput when input happens.

static_member.name: EVENTBASE_INPUTEVENT
static_member.desc: @name Input event types. Possible input event types dispatched by CoreInput.

member.name: mouseButton
member.desc: If this is a mouse click event, the mouse button that's pressed.

member.name: mousePosition
member.desc: If this is a mouse event, the mouse position.

member.name: key
member.desc: If this is a key event, the key code that's coming down or up.

member.name: charCode
member.desc: If this is a key press event, this will contain the unicode character that's being typed.

class.name: Label
class.desc: An image that can render text into itself. This class is mostly used internally in SceneLabel, but can be used by itself to manually create text-based textures.

method.name: Label
method.desc: Create a text label.

param.name: font
param.desc: Font to use for this label.

param.name: size
param.desc: Pixel size of the text to render.

param.name: antiAliasMode
param.desc: Antialiasing mode. Can be ANTIALIAS_FULL, ANTIALIAS_NONE or ANTIALIAS_STRONG.

param.name: premultiplyAlpha
param.desc: If set to true, will premultiply alpha in the label image. @see Font

method.name: setText
method.desc: Sets the text of the label.

method.name: getText
method.desc: Returns the current text of the label.

method.name: getTextWidthForString
method.desc: Returns the pixel width for the specified string based on the current label font and size settings.

method.name: getTextHeightForString
method.desc: Returns the pixel height for the specified string based on the current label font and size settings.

method.name: getTextWidth
method.desc: Returns the width of the current text.

method.name: getTextHeight
method.desc: Returns the height of the current text.

method.name: setColorForRange
method.desc: Sets the color for a range of characters in the label. The colors are only applied upon the next call to setText, not the currently rendered text. This call appends the color range to a list of color ranges, so if you are calling this multiple times for the same ranges, you must call clearColors.

param.name: color
param.desc: The color to set for the specified range.

param.name: rangeStart
param.desc: Starting index of the specified range.

param.name: rangeEnd
param.desc: Ending index of the specified range. @see clearColors

method.name: clearColors
method.desc: Clears the current label colors. @see setColorForRange

method.name: getColorForIndex
method.desc: Returns the text color for specified character index.

method.name: getPremultiplyAlpha
method.desc: Returns the premultiply alpha setting.

method.name: setPremultiplyAlpha
method.desc: If set to true, will premultiply alpha when text is set to the label.

method.name: setFont
method.desc: Sets the Font used to render text in the label. @see Font

method.name: getFont
method.desc: Returns the Font currently used to render text in the label. @see Font

method.name: setSize
method.desc: Sets the vertical pixel size of text rendered in the label.

method.name: getSize
method.desc: Return the current vertical pixel size of text rendered in the label.

method.name: getAntialiasMode
method.desc: Returns the current antialasing mode.

method.name: setAntialiasMode
method.desc: Sets the antialiasing mode used to render text.

param.name: newMode
param.desc: Antialiasing mode. Can be ANTIALIAS_FULL, ANTIALIAS_NONE or ANTIALIAS_STRONG.

method.name: getBaselineAdjust
method.desc: Returns the pixel distance from top of image to the baseline of the rendered text.

class.name: Material
class.class_notes: NOTE: Material instances are not automatically garbage collected.

class.name: MaterialManager
class.desc: Manages loading and reloading of materials, textures and shaders. This class should be only accessed from the CoreServices singleton.

class.name: Matrix4

method.name: identity
method.desc: Resets the matrix to identity.

method.name: rotateVector
method.desc: Rotates a vector by the matrix values.

method.name: getPosition
method.desc: Returns the position from the matrix.

method.name: Translate
method.desc: Translates the position in the matrix.

method.name: setPosition
method.desc: Sets the position in the matrix.

method.name: setScale
method.desc: Sets the scale in the matrix.

param.name: ay

param.desc: Pointer to yaw angle to set.

method.name: transpose

method.name: Inverse
method.desc: Returns the inverse of the matrix.

method.name: inverseAffine

class.name: Mesh
class.desc: A mesh comprised of vertices. When data in the mesh changes, arrayDirtyMap must be set to true for the appropriate array types (color, position, normal, etc). Available types are defined in RenderDataArray.
class.class_notes: NOTE: Mesh instances are not automatically garbage collected.

static_member.name: TRISTRIP_MESH
static_member.desc: Quad based mesh.

static_member.name: TRI_MESH
static_member.desc: Triangle based mesh.

static_member.name: TRIFAN_MESH
static_member.desc: Triangle fan based mesh.

static_member.name: LINE_MESH
static_member.desc: Line based mesh.

static_member.name: POINT_MESH
static_member.desc: Point based mesh.

static_member.name: LINE_STRIP_MESH
static_member.desc: Line strip based mesh.

static_member.name: LINE_LOOP_MESH
static_member.desc: Line loop based mesh.

method.name: Mesh
method.desc: Construct with an empty mesh of specified type.

param.name: meshType
param.desc: Type of mesh. Possible values are: Mesh.TRISTRIP_MESH, Mesh.TRI_MESH, Mesh.TRIFAN_MESH, Mesh.TRISTRIP_MESH, Mesh.LINE_MESH, Mesh.POINT_MESH.

method.name: MeshFromFileName
method.desc: Construct from a mesh loaded from a file.

method.name: loadMesh

param.name: fileName

method.name: getVertexCount

method.name: createPlane

method.name: createVPlane
method.desc: Creates a vertical plane mesh of specified size.

method.name: createCircle
method.desc: Creates a 2D circle.

method.name: createLineCircle
method.desc: Creates a 2D circle with normals pointing outwards from vertices.

method.name: createTorus
method.desc: Creates a torus.

method.name: createBox
method.desc: Creates a cube mesh of specified size.

method.name: createSphere
method.desc: Creates a sphere mesh of specified size.

method.desc: Creates an icosphere of specified radius

method.name: createOctosphere
method.desc: Creates an octosphere of specified radius

method.desc: Creates a cylinder mesh.

method.name: createCone

method.name: recenterMesh
method.desc: Recenters the mesh with all vertices being as equidistant from origin as possible.

method.name: getRadius
method.desc: Returns the radius of the mesh (furthest vertex away from origin).

method.name: calculateNormals
method.desc: Recalculates the mesh normals

method.name: calculateTangents
method.desc: Recalculates the tangent space vector for all vertices.

method.name: getMeshType

method.name: setMeshType
method.desc: Sets a new mesh type.

param.name: newType
param.desc: New mesh type. Possible values are: Mesh.TRISTRIP_MESH, Mesh.TRI_MESH, Mesh.TRIFAN_MESH, Mesh.TRISTRIP_MESH, Mesh.LINE_MESH, Mesh.POINT_MESH.

method.name: calculateBBox
method.desc: Calculates the mesh bounding box.

method.name: hasVertexBuffer
method.desc: Checks if the mesh has a vertex buffer.

method.name: removeVertexRange
method.desc: Removes a range of vertices starting at beginRemoveVertex. vertexRemovalCount should be a multiple of the num if you want to keep your mesh data clean. If this is an indexedMesh, will also remove any faces that reference

param.name: beginRemoveVertex
param.desc: First element of the vertex array to remove

param.name: vertexRemovalCount
param.desc: Number of elements to remove from the vertex array

method.name: removeFace
method.desc: Removes a face from the mesh. Face is defined as a triangle for TRI_MESH, or a line for LI In indexedMesh mode this may result in orphaned vertices.

param.name: faceIndex
param.desc: The 0-indexed face of the mesh (and NOT the index into the indices array!)

method.name: removeUnusedVertices
method.desc: For indexedMesh only, removes any unused vertices from the mesh.

class.name: ObjectEntry
class.desc: Single entry in an Object. Object entries can be accessed as dictionaries or arrays.

member.name: type
member.desc: Type of entry. Possible values are (FLOAT_ENTRY, INT_ENTRY, BOOL_ENTRY, ARRAY_ENTRY, STRING_ENTRY, CONTAINER_ENTRY).

member.name: name
member.desc: Lookup key for this object entry.

member.name: NumberVal
member.desc: Number value of this object entry.

member.name: intVal
member.desc: Integer value of this object entry.

member.name: stringVal
member.desc: String value of this object entry.

member.name: boolVal
member.desc: Boolean value of this object entry.

member.name: length
member.desc: Length of this object entry if its type is ARRAY_ENTRY.

method.name: ObjectEntry
method.desc: Default constructor

method.name: readNumber
method.desc: Tries to write the Number value of this[key] to out.

param.name: key
param.desc: A pointer to the value to write the number value to.

method.name: readString
method.desc: Tries to write the String value of this[key] to out.

param.name: key
param.desc: A pointer to the value to write the String value to.

method.name: readBool
method.desc: Tries to write the boolean value of this[key] to out.

param.name: key
param.desc: A pointer to the value to write the boolean value to.

method.name: addChild
method.desc: Adds an empty child entry.

param.name: name
param.desc: Lookup key for the object entry.

class.name: Resource
class.desc: Base class for resources. All resources that are managed by the ResourceManager subclass this.

method.name: Resource
method.desc: @name Public members Available public members

class.name: ResourceManager
class.desc: Manages loading and unloading of resources from directories and archives. Should only be accessed via the CoreServices singleton.

class.name: Scene
class.desc: Rendering container. The Scene class is the main container for all rendering in Polycode. Scenes are automatically rendered and need only be instantiated to immediately add themselves to the rendering pipeline. A Scene is created with a camera automatically.
class.class_notes: NOTE: Scene instances are not automatically garbage collected.

member.name: clearColor
member.desc: Scene clear color

member.name: useClearColor
member.desc: If set to true, the renderer will clear the screen prior to rendering the scene @default true

member.name: useClearDepth
member.desc: If set to true, the renderer will clear the depth buffer prior to rendering the scene. @default true

member.name: ambientColor
member.desc: Ambient color, passed to lighting shaders

member.name: fogColor
member.desc: Fog color, passed to lighting shaders.

member.name: enabled
member.desc: If this is set to false, the scene is not rendered or updated during the render loop.

member.name: ownsChildren
member.desc: If ownsChildren is set to true, the scene will delete its children upon destruction (defaults to false).

method.name: Scene
method.desc: Default constructor with options.

param.name: sceneType
param.desc: Type of scene to create. Can be Scene.SCENE_2D, Scene.SCENE_3D or Scene.SCENE_2D_TOPLEFT

param.name: virtualScene
param.desc: If this flag is set to true, the scene is not rendered to the screen. Use this if you want to render the scene only to a texture.

method.name: addEntity
method.desc: Adds a new Entity to the scene

method.name: addChild
method.desc: Adds a new Entity to the scene

method.name: removeEntity
method.desc: Removes a Entity from the scene

method.name: getDefaultCamera
method.desc: Returns the scene's default camera.

method.name: getActiveCamera
method.desc: Returns the scene's active camera.

method.name: setActiveCamera
method.desc: Sets the scene's active camera.

param.name: camera
param.desc: New camera to set as the active camera.

method.name: enableFog
method.desc: Enables and disables fog in the scene.

param.name: enable
param.desc: If false, disables lighting in the scene, if true, enables it.

method.name: setFogProperties
method.desc: Sets the fog properties for the scene.

method.name: addLight
method.desc: Adds a light to the scene.

param.name: light
param.desc: Light to add to the scene.

method.name: removeLight
method.desc: Removes a light from the scene.

param.name: light
param.desc: Light to remove from the scene.

method.desc: Create screen image from Texture.

class.name: SceneLabel
class.desc: 3D text label. Creates a 3D text label.
class.class_notes: NOTE: SceneLabel instances are not automatically garbage collected.

method.name: setText
method.desc: Sets new text for the labe.

class.name: SceneLight
class.desc: 3D light source. Lights can be point or spot lights and can be set to different colors.
class.class_notes: NOTE: SceneLight instances are not automatically garbage collected.

method.name: SceneLight
method.desc: Constructs a light with parameters.

param.name: type
param.desc: Type of light to create. Can be SceneLight.POINT_LIGHT or SceneLight.SPOT_LIGHT

method.name: setIntensity
method.desc: Sets the light's intensity

method.name: setAttenuation
method.desc: Sets the attenuation values for the light.

method.name: setSpecularLightColor
method.desc: Sets the light color.

method.name: setDiffuseLightColor
method.desc: Sets the light color.

method.name: setLightColor
method.desc: Sets both the specular and diffust light colors. Use setDiffuseLightColor and setSpecularLightColor to set the individual light colors.

method.name: setSpotlightProperties
method.desc: Sets the spotlight properties. These control the shape of the spotlight beam.

method.name: enableShadows
method.desc: If this is called with 'true', the light will generate a shadow map.

param.name: val
param.desc: If set to true, enables this light to cast shadows.

param.name: resolution
param.desc: Resolution of the shadow map. (defaults to 256x256).

method.name: setShadowMapFOV
method.desc: This sets the shadow map field of view. The larger the field of view, the more of the scene it encompasses, but the more quality it loses.

method.name: getShadowMapFOV
method.desc: Returns the light's shadow map field of view.

method.name: areShadowsEnabled
method.desc: Returns true if shadows are enabled.

method.name: getLightType
method.desc: Returns the light type.

class.name: SceneCurve
class.desc: BezierCurve scene rendering/placement class. You can use this class to place a bezier curve in scene space for use as animation tracks or rendering.

class.name: SceneLine
class.desc: 3D line class. Can connect two SceneEntity classes with a line.
class.class_notes: NOTE: SceneLine instances are not automatically garbage collected.

method.name: SceneLine
method.desc: Constructs the line with two taraget entities.

method.name: SceneLineWithPositions
method.desc: Constructs the line with two taraget positions.

class.name: SceneManager
class.desc: This class manages all rendered scenes in Polycode.

method.name: addScene
method.desc: Adds a scene to the render loop. Scenes automatically add themselves to the manager on creation, so there's no need to call this manually unless you remove a scene yourself.

method.name: removeScene
method.desc: Removes scene from the render loop (does not delete the scene).

class.name: SceneMesh
class.desc: 3D polygonal mesh instance. The SceneMesh is the base for all polygonal 3d geometry. It can have simple textures or complex materials applied to it.
class.class_notes: NOTE: SceneMesh instances are not automatically garbage collected.

member.name: lineWidth
member.desc: Line width for line-based meshes.

member.name: lineSmooth
member.desc: If set to true, will antialias the lines in a line-based mesh. Defaults to false.

member.name: pointSmooth
member.desc: If setto true, will antialias points in a point-based mesh. Defaults to false.

member.name: ownsMesh
member.desc: If true, will delete its Mesh upon destruction or mesh loading. (defaults to true)

member.name: ownsSkeleton
member.desc: If true, will delete its Skeleton upon destruction. (defaults to true)

member.name: useGeometryHitDetection
member.desc: If set to true, will check against actual geometry polygons on ray hit detection. Defaults to false.

member.name: alphaTest
member.desc: Normally, translucent textures do not affect the depth buffer, but if this flag is set to true, this entity's alpha channel is written to the depth buffer at a preset threshold. This flag is set to false by default.

member.name: backfaceCulled
member.desc: If this flag is set to false, backface culling is disabled when rendering this entity, rendering both sides of each face. Set to true by default.

method.name: SceneMesh
method.desc: Construct a scene mesh from a mesh file.

param.name: fileName
param.desc: Path to mesh file to load.

method.name: SceneMeshFromMesh
method.desc: Construct scene mesh from an existing Mesh instance.

method.name: SceneMeshWithType
method.desc: Construct an empty scene mesh with the specified type.

param.name: meshType
param.desc: Mesh type to create. See Mesh for possible values.

method.name: getMesh
method.desc: Returns the Mesh instance of the actual mesh.

method.name: getMaterial
method.desc: Returns the material applied.

method.name: loadSkeleton
method.desc: Loads a skeleton from a file and applies it to the scene mesh.

param.name: fileName
param.desc: Filename to load the skeleton from.

method.name: clearMaterial
method.desc: Clears the currently applied material

method.name: setMaterial
method.desc: Set material from existing Material instance.

method.name: setMaterialByName
method.desc: Set material by name. You can create materials in material files and name them there, then use this to set a material by name to a scene mesh.

method.name: setMesh
method.desc: Set the mesh this scene mesh renders.

param.name: mesh
param.desc: Set a new mesh to render.

method.name: setSkeleton
method.desc: Sets a skeleton from an existing skeleton instance.

param.name: skeleton
param.desc: Skeleton to set to this mesh.

method.name: getSkeleton
method.desc: Returns the skeleton applied to this scene mesh.

method.name: setLineWidth
method.desc: Sets the line width for line-based meshes.

method.name: getFilename
method.desc: If this mesh was loaded form file, returns the filename of the loaded mesh.

method.name: setFilename
method.desc: Sets the filename path of the mesh.

method.name: loadFromFile
method.desc: Loads mesh from file. Deletes current mesh if ownsMesh is set to true.

method.name: setForceMaterial
method.desc: The Renderer has an ability to set an override material that is set for all rendered entities. If forceMaterial is set to true, this entity will always use its assigned material, even if an override material is set.

class.name: SceneRenderTexture
class.desc: Renders scenes to texture. This class automatically renders a scene to a texture every frame that you can use to texture anything else. You can set a scene to virtual (see Scene for details) to only render a scene to a texture if you need to. This class automatically adds itself to the render cycle, so you do not need to do anything manual every frame.

method.name: SceneRenderTexture
method.desc: Construct a new render texture with parameters.

param.name: renderWidth
param.desc: Horizontal size of the render texture.

param.name: renderHeight
param.desc: Vertical size of the render texture.

param.name: floatingPoint
param.desc: Pass true if you want fp16 target renders

method.name: getTargetTexture
method.desc: Returns the actual render texture.

method.name: getTargetScene
method.desc: Returns the target scene.

method.name: getTargetCamera
method.desc: Returns the target camera.

class.name: String
class.desc: Unicode-friendly string. The Polycode String class wraps around STL wstring to support Unicode text in the engine. You can request data from it in different encodings (currently only UTF-8) or plain char data. It is mostly just a wrapper around STL created for easier Unicode support, LUA bindings and convenience methods.

static_member.name: ENCODING_UTF8
static_member.desc: UTF-8 encoding.

member.name: contents
member.desc: STL string version of the string.

member.name: w_contents
member.desc: STL string version of the string.

method.name: String
method.desc: Default constructor

method.name: size
method.desc: Return the length of the string.

method.name: length
method.desc: Return the length of the string.

method.name: substr
method.desc: Returns the substring of the string.

param.name: pos
param.desc: Position of a character in the current string object to be used as starting character for the substring.

method.name: rfind
method.desc: Find last occurrence of content in string.

param.name: str
param.desc: String to be searched for in the object.

param.name: pos
param.desc: Position of the last character in the string to be taken into consideration for possible matches. The default value indicates that the entire string is searched.

method.name: find
method.desc: Find content in string.

param.name: str
param.desc: String to be searched for in the object.

param.name: pos
param.desc: Position of the first character in the string to be taken into consideration for possible matches. The default value indicates that the entire string is searched.

method.name: find_last_of
method.desc: Find character in string from the end. Searches the string from the end for any of the characters that are part of the passed string.

param.name: str
param.desc: String containing the characters to search for.

param.name: pos
param.desc: Position of the last character in the string to be taken into consideration for possible matches. The default value indicates that the entire string is searched.

method.name: find_first_of
method.desc: Find character in string from the beginning. Searches the string from the beginnign for any of the characters that are part of the passed string.

param.name: str
param.desc: String containing the characters to search for.

param.name: pos
param.desc: Position of the first character in the string to be taken into consideration for possible matches. The default value indicates that the entire string is searched.

method.name: toLowerCase
method.desc: Returns the lowercase version of the string.

method.name: toUpperCase
method.desc: Returns the uppercase version of the string.

method.name: split
method.desc: Splits the string by the specified delimeter

method.name: replace
method.desc: Replaces parts of the string with another string.

param.name: what
param.desc: Ocurrences of which string to replace in this string.

method.name: NumberToString
method.desc: Convert a Number to a String.

method.name: IntToString
method.desc: Convert an integer to a String.

method.name: c_str
method.desc: Pointer to char data.

method.name: getDataWithEncoding
method.desc: Returns data with the specified encoding. Currently the only supported encoding is String.ENCODING_UTF8

method.name: getWDataWithEncoding
method.desc: Returns wide character data with the specified encoding. Currently the only supported encoding is String.ENCODING_UTF8

method.name: append
method.desc: Returns the size of the data with the specified encoding. Currently the only supported encoding is String.ENCODING_UTF8

method.name: setDataWithEncoding
method.desc: Sets the data for the string

param.name: data
param.desc: Data to set the string with.

method.name: isNumber
method.desc: Checks if the string is a number
